ðŸ“– Summary: Tenere is a Rust-based application that offers a terminal user interface (TUI) for interacting with Large Language Models (LLMs). It supports multiple backends like ChatGPT, llama.cpp, and ollama, and provides features like syntax highlighting, chat history, vim keybindings and configuration options for a streamlined command-line LLM experience.
